title: The Future Of Racist Policing, (High) Kids Say The Weirdest Things 7.27.21
itunes:title: The Future Of Racist Policing, (High) Kids Say The Weirdest Things 7.27.21
description:
In episode 959, Jack and guest host Joelle Smith are joined by The Scroll Down co-host Marcella Arguello to discuss the fight against Anti-Vaxxers, the future of racist policing, little kids accidentally getting high, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Government officials, health groups move to require coronavirus vaccines for workers
  2. The Future of Racist Policing Is Here: Florida Police Getting Into Some Pre-Crime Except Without Precogs and With Racism
  3. Gunshot-Detecting Tech Is Summoning Armed Police to Black Neighborhoods
  4. Sundown Towns
  5. 5 Kids Under 10 Accidentally Eat A Bunch of THC Gummies
  6. Rick Lax - The Magician / Viral Video Creep Behind Those Women Making Spaghetti On Their Counters Videos
  7. LISTEN: J.Robb - Ayye Mane

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
